subject: Special Olympics
Commonwealth Games
Olympic Games (2012)
Paralympic Games
lead_paragraph: With a total of 22 medal events in five sports, the 2014 Commonwealth Games are the biggest yet for para-sport as organizers follow the lead of the successful Paralympic Games in London in 2012.
snippet: With a total of 22 medal events in five sports, the 2014 Commonwealth Games are the biggest yet for para-sport as organizers follow the lead of the successful Paralympic Games in London in 2012.
